articles.title: Supermarket chain Aldi to pay U.S. workers who get COVID-19 vaccination - Reuters
articles.description: German supermarket chain Aldi on Tuesday became the latest firm in the grocery sector to offer incentives for U.S. employees getting a COVID-19 vaccine, saying it would give up to four hours of pay to those who choose to receive inoculations.

articles.title: A man was ‘scared to go home due to covid.’ So he spent three months living in Chicago airport, prosecutors say. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Aditya Singh survived in part on food given to him by other passengers, grew out his beard, lectured travelers about Buddhism and Hinduism, and attempted to evade scrutiny by wearing an airport worker’s identification badge.
articles.content: When finally confronted over the weekend, Aditya Singh told police that he was scared to go home due to COVID, prosecutors said in a Sunday bond hearing, according to the Associated Press. During his… [+4485 chars]
